attributes.action: Prevent Scotland vetoing the EU referendum result and rule out a 2nd referendum
attributes.additional_details:
First point source (http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-36635012)

Second point source (http://news.sky.com/story/1646538/cameron-rules-out-second-eu-referendum)
attributes.background:
Respect the peoples choice.

Scotland remained within the Union via the referendum of September 2014 and consequently, is bound by UK collective decisions such as the EU ref vote.

David Cameron in February said that there could be no second referendum if the UK votes to leave the EU on 23 June.
